summary: the iowa board of chiropractic released a report wednesday detailing charges against charles manuel , of lamoni . manuel signed an agreement last month admitting his misdeeds and pledging not to apply for reinstatement for at least 10 years . the agreement requires that manuel prove any circumstances surrounding the revocation of his license no longer exist before he can resume practicing chiropractic in the state .

aspect: - A chiropractor in Iowa has surrendered his license to practice for swapping services for sex and performing exorcisms on patients.
- The chiropractor has received outstanding evaluations for patient satisfaction on HealthGrades.com.
- Manuel admitted wrongdoing to the Iowa Board of Chiropractic.
- The chiropractor's practice was located on a residential street in a small agricultural town in southern Iowa.
explain: In this aspect, it is mentioned that a chiropractor in Iowa surrendered his license to practice for performing sexually inappropriate acts on patients and performing exorcisms on them.

The given aspect highlights that the chiropractor, Charles Manuel, has received outstanding evaluations for patient satisfaction on HealthGrades.com. This suggests that he has a high level of customer satisfaction and his patients are happy with his services. This can be seen as a positive aspect since patient satisfaction is an important factor in determining the quality of care provided by a healthcare professional.

The core idea of this aspect is that Charles Manuel, a chiropractor in Lamoni, Iowa, signed an agreement last month admitting his misdeeds and pledging not to apply for reinstatement for at least 10 years. This agreement was made with the Iowa Board of Chiropractic and requires Manuel to prove that any circumstances related to the revocation of his license no longer exist before he can resume practicing chiropractic in the state.

The aspect states that the chiropractor's practice was located on a residential street in a small agricultural town in southern Iowa. This gives some context to the location and setting of the chiropractor's practice. It also gives an idea of the town and its surrounding areas, which may have an impact on the chiropractor's patients and their needs.
